summary: I BROUGHT MY FEB 3,2006: ON THAT DATE LESS THAT 2 HR AFTER I HAD CAR IT BEGAN TO SMOKE.  I CALLED THE MECHANIC HE TOLD ME TO GET AN OIL CHANGE.  I DID THIS, THEN ABOUT THREE HOURS LATER WHILE I WAS PARKING IT BEGAN TO SMOKE AGAIN AND MY NEIGHBOR CAME OUTSIDE TOLD ME TO GET OUT OF THE CAR BECAUSE I HAD A SMALL FIRE AT THE BOTTOM OF MY CAR.  I CALLED THE GUY, HE CAME AND TOWED IT THREE DAYS LATER WE HAD AN AGREEMENT TO GET ME A NEW CAR.  IT'S BEEN A WEEK I HAVE NO CAR AND ON TOP OF THAT I HAVE NOT BEEN REFUNDED.  I HAVE TRIED TO TALK WITH THEM SEVERAL TIMES I'VE GOTTEN EITHER THE COLD SHOULDER OR THE RUN AROUND.  IN THE MEANTIME THEY HAVE BOTH MY MONEY AND CAR. PLEASE HELP ME.  *NM

DT: THE CONTACT  HAD A HITCH INSTALLED ON  VEHICLE ON NOVEMBER 21, 2005 TO PULL A TRAILER. WHILE THE HITCH WAS BEING INSTALLED HE SAW A TECHNICIAN BEND THE SAFETY LATCH MECHANISM  AWAY FROM THE HITCH. THE LATCH IS SUPPOSED TO HAVE A PAD LOCK, SAFETY PEN, OR A BOLT TO KEEP IT FROM COMING LOOSE. AFTER DRIVING THE VEHICLE HOME HE COULDN'T BACK THE TRAILER INTO DRIVEWAY. HE WENT TO THE BACK OF THE TRUCK AND RELEASED THE LOWER HANDLE SO THAT HE COULD HAVE MORE ROOM TO MANEUVER WITHOUT THE TRAILER HITTING THE BACK OF THE TRUCK. HE FINALLY DETERMINED  THAT  HE WOULD HAVE TO PULL AROUND FROM A DIFFERENT DIRECTION TO BACK THE TRAILER INTO THE DRIVEWAY. HE PULLED OUT ONTO THE STREET ABOUT 30 YARDS AND THE FIFTH WHEEL CAME OUT OF THE HITCH AND CRUSHED THE  VEHICLE. THE CONTACT FELT  THIS OCCURRED BECAUSE THE SAFETY LATCH WAS NOT IN SECURELY.  WHILE LOOKING UNDER THE TRUCK HE NOTICED THEY CUT THE STRUCTURE OF VEHICLE, CAUSING IT TO WEAKEN. HE SPOKE WITH THE INSTALLERS OF THE TRAILER HITCH,  AND THE MANAGER TOLD HIM THEY HAVE INSTALLED AT LEAST 50-60 HITCHES INTO VEHICLES. THE VEHICLE IS A 2005 ,DODGE RAM ,1500. THE TRAILER IS A 1990 COACHMEN, CATALINA FIFTH WHEEL TRAILER.*AK  UPDATED 1/19/2006 -   *NM

PAKING COMPANY OF AMERICA LOCATED IN AKLAND CA. 195 98ST   145 98ST. OAKLAND, CA,  8350 PARDEE OAKLAND, CA  WHERE BUSES ARE PARKED. BUSES  TRANSPORT 16 CUSTOMERS AT A TIME FROM THE LOT TO INTERNATIONAL  AIRPORT 3RD CURVE.FRONT TIRES ARE BALD TO WHERE THREAD IS SHOWING,FIRE EXTINGUISHERS HAVE NOT BEEN CHANGED IN CLOSE TO 2 YEARS AND ARE EXPIRED AND HAVE BEEN PREVIOUSLY REPORTED. WHEN REPORTED TO MANAGEMENT SHAWN WALLY, AND DANIEL THEY SAID  IT'S OK JUST DRIVE IT ANYWAY AND GO PICKUP CUSTOMERS.  *AK

FAX FM MARK LENERTZ (WI) SEEKING A NATION WIDE RECALL OF THE CATERPILLAR ENGINE 3406E INSTALLED IN PETERBILT MOTOR TRUCKS.*MR  IN 1990 PETERBILT MOTOR COMPANY DESIGNED TRUCKS WITH A COOLING SYSTEM THAT WAS NOT ADEQUATE TO HANDLE THE HEAT THAT THE 3406E CATERPILLAR ENGINE PRODUCED.  THIS RESULTS IN REPEAT ENGINE FAILURE.  THE RECURRING PROBLEMS WERE REPEAT HEAD GASKET FAILURES, MELTING OF THE INTERNAL INJECTOR O-RINGS AND CRACKED ENGINE HEADS.   *NM

STEEL PLATE ON THE RANGEFINDER TOW BAR HAS CRACKED 80%. AT 100%, TOWED VEHICLE WILL DISCONNECT. WHEN I CALLED TO COMPLAIN, COMPANY RECOMMENDS ALL OWNERS STOP USING THE RANGEFINDER BX4222 TOW BAR. THEY OFFERED A SMALL TRADE-IN TOWARD THEIR NEWEST MODEL.

THIS IS THE SECOND TIME THE REAR MAIN SEAL HAS LEAKED OIL, CAUSING ENGINE DAMAGE. LAST TIME I HAD TO HAVE THE ENTIRE ENGINR REPLACED. I GET NO INDICATION THERE IS A PROBLEM WITH THE OIL PRESSURE. LAST TIME REPAIRS WERE OVER $5000. THIS PROBLEMS KEEPS COMING UP. I CAUGHT IT THIS TIME ,BEFORE I THREW A ROD.
BRAKE LIGHT IN REAR WINDOW IS CAUSING POOR VISIBILITY.  *YC
TIRES WHITE WALL PUNTURES, LEAKING AIR AFTER 2K MILES.  TT
